question: What is the name of newly elected president of Albania?
explanation: Ilir Rexhep Metaj is the President-elect of Albania. He take office on 24 July 2017, succeeding Bujar Nishani. He previously served as the 31st Prime Minister from 1999 to 2002. He was Minister of Foreign Affairs from 2002 to 2003 and again from 2009 to 2010.
